医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能可能有助于识别潜在的淋病疫苗蛋白淋病是一种性传播细菌感染，每年影响全球超过 8000 万人，它已对几乎所有已知的抗生素产生耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/AI-may-help-identify-潜在-淋病-疫苗-蛋白质.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/AI-may-help-identify-潜在-淋病-疫苗-蛋白质.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd95a6e7-e612-4f72-96be-d881ef7e6306 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 15:36:07 -0400 AI may help identify potential gonorrhea vaccine proteins
全球脑健康领导者试点奖旨在鼓励创新性痴呆症研究今天，阿尔茨海默病协会、全球脑健康研究所 (GBHI) 和英国阿尔茨海默病协会宣布了全球脑健康领导者试点奖的最新获奖者，这是一项竞争性资助计划，致力于培育该领域的努力和改善成果大脑健康和痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Pilot-Awards-for-Global-Brain-Health-Leaders-awarded-to-encourage-innovative-dementia-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Pilot-Awards-for-Global-Brain-Health-Leaders-awarded-to-encourage-innovative-dementia-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5920d285-b0db-4db2-ae11-6cbd9259f1a6 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 15:29:58 -0400 Pilot Awards for Global Brain Health Leaders awarded to encourage innovative dementia research
新药获得 FDA 批准用于治疗年轻男孩常见遗传病宾厄姆顿大学药学和药物科学学院教授开发的一种新药已获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 批准，用于治疗杜氏肌营养不良症 (DMD) 患者，这是一种常见的遗传性疾病，主要影响年轻男孩。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-drug-gets-FDA-approval-for-the-treatment-of-common-genic-disease-in-young-boys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-drug-gets-FDA-approval-for-the-treatment-of-common-genic-disease-in-young-boys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c22e44af-5385-4696-81eb-1634e376dce0 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 15:22:05 -0400 New drug gets FDA approval for the treatment of common genetic disease in young boys
研究制定了解决员工工作中不专业行为的指南萨里大学领导的一项新调查显示，了解 NHS 为何遭受普遍的欺凌和不专业行为，每年可以为该服务节省 28 亿英镑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Research-develops-guidelines-to-address-staff-unprofessional-behaviors-at-work.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Research-develops-guidelines-to-address-staff-unprofessional-behaviors-at-work.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=866620e3-bb0e-455f-a17e-db43ae02e6a8 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 15:05:39 -0400 Research develops guidelines to address staff unprofessional behaviors at work
手术肥胖治疗后患龋齿的风险更高接受过肥胖手术治疗的人患龋齿的风险比手术前更高。他们的口腔健康状况也经常下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Higher-risk-of-dental-caries-after-surgical-obesity-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Higher-risk-of-dental-caries-after-surgical-obesity-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f50cb94-8fda-4997-83a1-2ae4676f3061 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 15:00:10 -0400 Higher risk of dental caries after surgical obesity treatment
新研究表明骨关节炎可能是可治疗和可逆的目前的骨关节炎治疗是控制症状，而不是解决潜在的疾病，但阿德莱德大学的一项新研究表明，这种情况可能是可以治疗和逆转的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Osteoarthritis-may-be-treatable-and-reversible-new-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Osteoarthritis-may-be-treatable-and-reversible-new-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=822b0fd9-fdcf-4398-9454-bd73f564b8cf Tue, 31 Oct 2023 14:38:20 -0400 Osteoarthritis may be treatable and reversible, new study shows
研究表明患有未确诊多动症的儿童不必要地使用医疗保健这项研究由诺丁汉大学和伦敦国王学院的 Vibhore Prasad 博士和其他研究人员进行，并得到英国医学科学院的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Study-shows-unnecessary-healthcare-use-by-children-with-undiagnosed-ADHD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Study-shows-unnecessary-healthcare-use-by-children-with-undiagnosed-ADHD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a972adfe-a4f1-4e35-b96b-ed0a6a4446cd Tue, 31 Oct 2023 14:34:52 -0400 Study shows unnecessary healthcare use by children with undiagnosed ADHD
指尖血液测试有助于快速诊断儿童结核病由慕尼黑大学领导的一个国际研究联盟测试了一种快速的新型分析工具，该工具只需要指尖的血样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Fingertip-blood-test-could-aid-in-rapid-diagnosis-of-tuberculosis-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Fingertip-blood-test-could-aid-in-rapid-diagnosis-of-tuberculosis-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f883dba6-18ee-4be1-94aa-76f60d1a2fd2 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 14:17:21 -0400 Fingertip blood test could aid in rapid diagnosis of tuberculosis in children
研究强调拥有 GED 证书的老年人之间存在显着的健康差异本月早些时候在《国际老龄化与人类发展杂志》上发表的新研究强调，拥有普通教育发展 (GED) 证书的老年人与拥有高中文凭的同龄人相比，在健康方面存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Research-highlights-significant-health-disparities-among-older-adults-with-a-GED-certificate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Research-highlights-significant-health-disparities-among-older-adults-with-a-GED-certificate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46bf40d4-ef25-4780-b07a-2942273d9921 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 14:02:45 -0400 Research highlights significant health disparities among older adults with a GED certificate
在世界大部分地区，抗生素不再有效治疗儿童感染由于抗生素耐药率很高，治疗儿童和婴儿常见感染的药物在世界大部分地区不再有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Antibiotics-no-longer- effective-in-treating-childhood-infections-in-large-parts-of-the-world.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Antibiotics-no-longer- effective-in-treating-childhood-infections-in-large-parts-of-the-world.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6df6df71-e735-4d70-8f38-3dcf69624982 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 13:53:54 -0400 Antibiotics no longer effective in treating childhood infections in large parts of the world
